Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Snarling as she walked through the wreck of their ship, SnowBlazer wondered 
just how she'd been talked into this mission. Not to mention one full of 
macho-egotists. She kneeled down to pick up a small piece of some machine or 
another, examining it before tossing it across the room with disgust 
"Useless!"

And to think she had been downgraded to this...trying to see what she could 
scrounge from the ship as others argued like CHILDREN...someone such as 
herself!

--part1_135.ab01e5b.29bcf6a6_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
